metadata.description: Public marketplace for Claude Code plugins and MCP clients from CE Dot Net

plugins.name: ace
plugins.description: Code Engine ACE - Intelligent pattern learning with three-tier capture: PostToolUse (main agent), SubagentStop (Task agents), Stop (session end). v5.3.6: Major performance optimization - incremental transcript parsing prevents wasteful re-processing of old messages (each task now learns only from its own work). Requires ce-ace >= v1.0.13.
